effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 957,204 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 524,775.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 76 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.6 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 6,246 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 1,863 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Cloak of Transcendence

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
